price: Ese nta gihe kirekire cyabayeho umuntu ari ikintu kitazwi?
arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ حِينٞ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهۡرِ لَمۡ يَكُن شَيۡـٔٗا مَّذۡكُورًا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: hal atā ʿalā al-insāni ḥīnun mina al-dahri lam yakun shayan madhkūran
